Class TileDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • TileDrawer

  • public class TileDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class is used to draw tiles. It also controls the size of the tiles.

    We use a separate class for this since FrontEndTileHolders need to draw tiles, but we may also need to draw tiles directly from the window when click / dragging. -AC

    Includes flashingTiles and setFlash which are used to warn user when they try to put it in an occupied slot. -MG

    See Also:
    flashingTiles, setFlash

      This determines the size that tiles are rendered at.

    • Method Detail

      • drawTile

        public static void drawTile(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            java.awt.Image img,
                            int rot)
        Draws a tile to a graphics object at a specified position with a specified image -- Basically a wrapper for drawImage now. -AC, MG
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics2D object
        x - Integer x position of tile
        y - Integer y position of tile
        img - Image of tile
        rot - rotation of Tile represented in 90 degree clockwise rotations
        See Also:
        GameTile

      • setFlash

        public static void setFlash(java.awt.Image img,
                            boolean enable)
        Sets the flash property of a GameTile's image according to enable. -MG
        Parameters:
        img - Image of tile to set flash property
        enable - Boolean to toggle/detoggle
